pet.name: Cat Lady Box
pet.information: We're obsessed with cats, and if you are too, this is the box for you! Get exclusive cat-themed shirts, accessories, home decor, and more for you, plus toys for your kitties too! Each month has a new theme, and we design every single item inside ourselves! Treat yourself and your cats and start right meow! The following prices are for shirt sizes small to large.  A monthly subscription is $39.99 a month.  A three-month pre-paid subscription averages $38.66 a month, totaling $115.99, four times a year.  A six-month pre-paid subscription averages $38.33 a month, totaling $229.99, twice a year.  For more information, go to www.catladybox.com.
pet.paragraph1: We're obsessed with cats, and if you are too, this is the box for you! Get exclusive cat-themed shirts, accessories, home decor, and more for you, plus toys for your kitties too! Each month has a new theme, and we design every single item inside ourselves! Treat yourself and your cats and start right meow! The following prices are for shirt sizes small to large.

box of the week.name: The Standard - Wine Club
box of the week.information: We do the hard work of scouring the globe for exclusive wines, so wine lovers like you don't have to.  Not only does each delivery come with hand-selected wine based on your flavor preferences, but many deliveries will include a featured item that pairs perfectly with the month or season.  A monthly subscription is $49 a month.  A three-month pre-paid subscription is $49 a month, totaling $147, four times a year.  A six-month pre-paid subscription is $49 a month, totaling $294, twice a year.  For more information, go to cratejoy.com.
box of the week.paragraph1: We do the hard work of scouring the globe for exclusive wines, so wine lovers like you don't have to.  Not only does each delivery come with hand-selected wine based on your flavor preferences, but many deliveries will include a featured item that pairs perfectly with the month or season.

male-baby.name: CAM Kids Craft Box
male-baby.information: CAM Kids Craft Box is for anyone looking for fun and creative activities to do with kids.  Each box includes all the materials you need to create 4 DIY crafts monthly.  Each box also includes a book that can be used for family reading time and small trinkets for the child receiving the box.  A monthly subscription is $40 a month.  A three-month pre-paid subscription is $40 a month, totaling $120, four times a year.  For more information, go to cratejoy.com.

Each box also includes a book that can be used for family reading time and small trinkets for the child receiving the box.

male-child.name: The Spangler Science Club
male-child.information: Let's make science fun one month at a time! A subscription to Spangler Science Club is a guarantee that we're working together to prepare your young scientist for a future STEM-based career.  A monthly subscription is $19.99 a month.  A three-month pre-paid subscription is $19.99 a month, totaling $59.97, four times a year.  A six-month pre-paid subscription averages $19.16 a month, totaling $114.97, twice a year.  An annual pre-paid subscription averages $18.32 a month, totaling $219.88, once a year.  For more information, go to www.stevespanglerscience.com.
male-child.paragraph1: Let's make science fun one month at a time! A subscription to Spangler Science Club is a guarantee that we're working together to prepare your young scientist for a future STEM-based career.

Monthly: $19.99/month
3-Month: $19.99/month = $59.97 - 4x a year
6-Month: $19.16/month = $114.97 - 2x a year
Annual: $18.32/month = $219.88 - 1x a year

male-teen.name: SpiceBreeze
male-teen.information: Discover delicious meals from around the world with minimal time and effort.  Cook your selected meals with delightful flavors from different regions of the world.  Includes simplified recipes, global fun facts, and freshly ground pure spices - pre-portioned for easy cooking and no waste.  The following prices are for a Wunderlust subscription.  A monthly subscription is $8.90 a month.  A three-month pre-paid subscription is $8.90 a month, totaling $26.70, four times a year.  A six-month pre-paid subscription is $8.90 a month, totaling $53.40, twice a year.  An annual pre-paid subscription is $8.90 a month, totaling $ 106.80, once a year.  For more information, go to spicebreeze.com.

male-adult.name: Date Night In Box
male-adult.information: Each Date Night In box delivers a complete date night to be enjoyed from home.  Each date includes several: interactive activities, accessories for ambiance, high-quality snacks or mixers, chef-curated dinner menus, connection with your significant other, and more.  A monthly subscription is $41.99 a month.  A three-month pre-paid subscription is $40 a month, totaling $120, four times a year.  A six-month pre-paid subscription averages $39.83 a month, totaling $239, twice a year.  An annual subscription averages $38.67 a month, totaling $464, once a year.  For more information, go to datenight in box.com.

female-child.name: Find Your Wings
female-child.information: Fashion Angels has always challenged Tweens to find your wings.  Our subscription boxes will do just that.  We have packed our December box with over $80 in craft activities, bath, beauty, and on-trend fashion accessories.  A monthly subscription is $35 a month.  A three-month pre-paid subscription is $33 a month, totaling $99, four times a year.  A six-month pre-paid subscription is $30 a month, totaling $180, twice a year.  An annual subscription averages $27.08 a month, totaling $325, once a year.  For more information, go to cratejoy.com.

female-teen.name: MATTER
female-teen.information: We search planet Earth for the most interesting forms of matter.  Each month we ship fossils, tools, specimens, materials, or artifacts that have been carefully selected as some of the most interesting pieces of matter in our accessible universe.  Part museum, part laboratory, perfect for quarantine.  A monthly subscription is $39.95 a month.  A three-month pre-paid subscription averages $34.98 a month, totaling $104.95, four times a year.  A six-month pre-paid subscription averages $29.99 a month, totaling $179.95, twice a year.  For more information, go to www.boxofmatter.com.

female-adult.name: Crated with Love
female-adult.information: You and your significant other will receive one date night box per month that includes 4 to 5 challenges or activities to help inspire laughter and strengthen your relationship.  With our creative and unique themes, each date is specifically designed by our team to make date night fun again! A monthly subscription is $39.99 a month.  A three-month pre-paid subscription is $37.99 a month, totaling $113.97, four times a year.  A six-month pre-paid subscription is $34.99 a month, totaling $209.94, twice a year.  An annual subscription is $29.99 a month, totaling $359.88, once a year.  For more information, go to www.crated withlove.com.

neutral-baby.name: Cub Pantry
neutral-baby.information: We curated this monthly box, focusing on nutritious snacks made with low sugar, whole grains, real ingredients, and fruits and veggie treats.  A monthly subscription is $39.99 a month.  For more information, go to www.cubpantry.com.

neutral-child.name: Bombs and Bubbles
neutral-child.information: Our bath bomb and bubbles box is a monthly delight.  We offer an in-home experience for you to sit back and relax and let the day go away.  We also have bath bombs and bubbles that are great for kids, you know the ones that don't like to take baths.  Our bath bombs are carb-free, vegan, and cruelty-free.  A monthly subscription is $17.99 a month.  A three-month pre-paid subscription is $17.33 a month, totaling $51.99, four times a year.  A six-month pre-paid subscription averages $16.50 a month, totaling $98.99, twice a year.  An annual subscription averages $15 a month, totaling $179.99, once a year.  For more information, go to www.bombs andbubblesbox.com.

neutral-teen.name: The Deadbolt Mystery Society Monthly Box
neutral-teen.information: Enjoy immersive scenarios, intriguing characters, and original compelling stories with your friends and family! Each month, subscribers receive a new stand-alone case file with everything needed to close the case and solve the mystery! A monthly subscription is $24.99 a month.  A three-month pre-paid subscription is $23.33 a month, totaling $69.99, four times a year.  A six-month pre-paid subscription averages $22.50 a month, totaling $134.99, twice a year.  An annual pre-paid subscription averages $21.67 a month, totaling $259.99, once a year.  For more information, go to deadboltmysterysociety.com.

neutral-adult.name: SpearCraft Book Box
neutral-adult.information: As seen in Oprah Magazine, we are a monthly subscription box full of goodies that you can open in the comfort of your own home.  We've taken the guesswork out of finding your next good read by always including a gorgeous new hardcover Y.A. novel, personalized author swag, and handpick bookish goodies for you to unbox and enjoy all month long.  A monthly subscription is $29.99 a month.  A three-month pre-paid subscription is $28.50 a month, totaling $85.50, four times a year.  A six-month pre-paid subscription is $27 a month, totaling $162, twice a year.  An annual subscription is $25 a month, totaling $300, once a year.  For more information, go to cratejoy.com.
